name: Devices_Post
description:
Creates or updates a Device or updates it's values. 
            For a new device leave the ID empty. To create a device you have to set the DeviceEnergyType.
            To update values, add the ID of the device and the values you like to set.  (See the Data Type Model for more Information)

body.description: Device object with all the data

$block: Container Class for the Web API

$ul: **ActivePower**: The Active Power or current flow rate. In kW or m3/h
**CounterReading**: The Meter Counter Reading (Total Energy used) in kWh or m3.
**CounterReadingExport**: The Meter Counter Reading only export
**CounterReadingExportT1**: The Meter Counter Reading only export (Tariff 1)
**CounterReadingExportT2**: The Meter Counter Reading only export (Tariff 2)
**CounterReadingT1**: The Meter Counter Reading Tariff 1 in kWh or m3.
**CounterReadingT2**: The Meter Counter Reading Tariff 2 in kWh or m3.
**DeviceEnergyType**: The Energy Type of this device
**MeterSubType**: The Sub Type of this Meter.
**PowerFactorL1**: The Power Factor (cos phi) Phase L1. Range: 0 - 1
**PowerFactorL2**: The Power Factor (cos phi) Phase L2. Range: 0 - 1
**PowerFactorL3**: The Power Factor (cos phi) Phase L3. Range: 0 - 1
**ValueDate**: The Date of the Value (in UTC). If this is null the Server Time is used.
